contents.text: Welcome to ValiMail, the world leader in email authentication and security based in San Francisco.
For information on our email authentication and DMARC solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Understand DMARC solution features and pricing quickly
I’d like an overview of your email authentication offerings and a pricing estimate for a small veteran-led consultancy.
I want to discuss DMARC and SPF/DKIM integration options and get a sales specialist’s input on our authentication roadmap.
I need help setting up your email authentication and DMARC—I’m not very tech-savvy.
I’d like to learn more about your email authentication and DMARC capabilities for a research project.

contents.text: To discuss enterprise licensing and volume pricing, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise sales team.

navigationGoals: Discuss enterprise licensing options and volume discounts
I need volume licensing and enterprise pricing details for deploying your DMARC solution across our organization.
I need a volume pricing quote for an enterprise license covering 5000 users with tiered discount rates.
I want information on enterprise licensing and volume pricing for our email solution.
I need to discuss enterprise licensing options and volume discounts for our university department.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot an API integration issue with the service
I’m having trouble configuring SPF and DMARC on my mail server and need technical assistance.
I’m having SPF alignment errors and need help troubleshooting our email authentication policies.
I’m having issues with email delivery and need technical troubleshooting help.
I'm having trouble with SPF alignment in our setup and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: Check my billing statement and update payment information
I want to update my billing information and review my most recent invoice.
I’d like to review my current subscription invoice, update payment details and verify account billing settings.
I don’t understand my latest bill and need assistance with billing and account charges.
I have questions about a recent invoice and need to update my billing details.
